resources.string: 3160 Al Hussain Ibn Ali, At Taawun, Riyadh 12475

"In 2020, Pew Pew founder Abdulrahman Al-Rasheed had the chance to bring his cooking skills to perfection at his kitchen in Riyadh and he didn’t hesitate. Together with his cousin Belal, he made his way across the pond to the big city. Inspired by the American style of food, they didn’t wait long and opened their first Pew Pew restaurant in January of 2021. Their mission was high quality food, fresh products and attention to detail. "

Our beef Pew Pew stands for two things: quality and regional origin. That’s why we offer 100% juicy beef. The cows spend their lifetime breathing the fresh air in the open countryside with more than enough space. By working together closely with our farmer we make sure our guests Pew Pew get the best beef there is. And you can definitely taste it!
"We are extremely proud of our burger buns. Thanks to a homemade recipe by founder Abdulrahman Al-Rasheed, our guests at Pew Pew can enjoy the perfect buns, fluffy and tasty at the same time. "

Every burger Pew Pew provides a unique flavor. Main reasons are our delicious, homemade sauces. To make them, we of course only use fresh products, so we stick to our mission: to offer our guests the best quality possible. From our secret House Sauce to our daily fresh made guacamole, these sauces, combined with our beef and our buns, result in the unique taste of our burgers.
